content.detailedDescription: I was outside around 7:30pm getting my backpack from school when i was on the steps going down to the driveway i looked up at the sky and i saw three triangle shaped ufo's zigzagging in all directions they left a white cloud like line and there was two of them so i ran inside and grabed my cell phone then i called my friends and they said they seen it to so it just wasent me it was a mass sighting.
content.summary: It was a triangle with three brigt white lights on the corners and one red in the middle

content.detailedDescription:
I am not sure just what all i am comfortable putting out here in a public place but i will share the first of many events as i recall it. 
i remember that it was the first part of summer after school was out my first grade year. i lived out near the kokomo airport. i remember walking out into the back yard and mom had sheets hanging on the cloths line. i saw 3 sets of little feet under the edge of a sheet, so i walked around the sheet to see who was there. it was 3 little people just my size. the 4 of us or the 3 of them talked for what seemed a long time. after the event i told my older brother... (2years older) all about what the little people talked about.. i told him how the little people talked without moving their mouths.. his response was how could any one talk without moving their mouths and that i was a big liar.  i tried to explain to him that it was like bubbles came out of their heads and when the bubbles burst i could hear their words...My family seemed to act as if i had a big imagination. eventually as i grew up when i recounted the story as a funny story i made up as a child. when close encounters of the 3rd kind came out i was very excited to see the show. when the little people came out of the ship i got very excited and before i thought about it i was saying out loud... oh my god it really did happen.. 
i did observe from the movies little people that the eyes of the little people seems to be wrong...   
i will say that one time when i was in my 30s that i was with a group of people that had a guest speaker that researched ufo's and other events such as personal contacts and i tried to share some of my story with him. he asked me what color their cloths were and as i tried to tell him i heard myself tell him their cloths were silver... i knew that was wrong but that is the only word that would come out of my mouth.  after that he just dismissed my story..  until i met glen means i have never talked about the little people to any one that i thought might be investigating the other people as i have come to think of them.  my encounters with the little people have never been a negative experience and i have as a grown up felt protective of them because of the negative prejudices humans have for each other let alone what i felt would be even more horrific to the little people.  why am i sharing this now... i'm not 100% sure except that as an older woman with more life experience i feel there surely must be other people out there that  have had good experiences with the others (little people and more) i feel it is time and suspect the time for humans and the others will be meeting more often and i hope that we can meet and greet in a positive way in spite of us humans.  well there it is ... i hope this gives courage to other humans to share their stories and help the humans that live in the fear to know that there are others out there and here and we will come together in a positive way if we as humans choose to do so.
i am not discounting any persons experience that was not a positive experience. i am just saying that they are not all negative and there can be open communication with out fear.
content.summary: Personal contact

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were standing on the porch which faces east at approximately 10.38pm on 4th june, 2012.  we observed 2 orange orbs side by side.  within seconds there were 3 in the shape of a triangle.  my husband ran into the house to get the video camera.  the orbs changed from 2 to 3.  then another one appeared to the right of the original 3, and the first 3 disappeared.  from the 2nd orb, 3 more appeared and he continued to film.

the video basically shows it all.  the actual even lasted around 15 minutes, even though the video footage runs for just over 9 minutes.  we did miss some of the first few minutes, and also edited out the focusing of the ojects.

these objects appeared above the horizon in an easterly direction over apple valley, ca.
content.summary: Amber colored orbs hovering over apple valley, ca

content.detailedDescription: bright ufo, appeared out of no where.  flew for a few seconds and disappeared into the night sky!
content.summary: Bright ufo

content.detailedDescription: Showed up out of no where for a few seconds.   got very bright, then flew for a few seconds and disappear into the night sky!
content.summary: Very bright ufo

content.detailedDescription: This was something that i've never been able to explain, so i'm posting this here just in case it was something truly anomalous. my mother and i were at an evening bat program put on by the rangers at carlsbad caverns. around 8:30, the program ended and the cars left the parking lot. we waited until all the other cars were gone (maybe around 8:45) and it was getting dark before we left. we were the only car on the road as we made our way back into carlsbad (route 180)on a two-lane highway. around 9 pm, i noticed a bright white/yellow orb about the size of a basketball (perhaps larger) approach the car from the behind (it followed the road, but approached rapidly). the light stopped very close to the bumper (there was maybe half a car length between us and the object). i at first thought it was a motorcycle and i thought it was weird that they were so close to the bumper and that the person did not try to pass us since there were no other vehicles on the road. the object followed the car at the same speed for a minute or so when i decided to roll down the window. there was no sound other than our own car (no loud motorcycle engine noise either). at one point, my mom turned on the brights of our car and a smaller light underneath the larger orb appeared as she did so (it was rectangular and yellow about the length of a pencil). a few moments later, a car approached in the other lane with its headlights on. my mom turned off her brights and the smaller light under the object "turned off" as well. i waited for the headlights of the approaching car to illuminate the road behind us so i could see if this was a motorcycle. just as the other car's headlights were about to light the road where the object was, the orb dimmed quickly and was gone. the lights of the approaching car clearly lit the road, but there was nothing behind us: no motorcycle, no car, nothing. there wasn't anyone on the shoulder (which was actually lined by cones) and no one was in the other lane. it simply vanished and was not seen again. the light appeared to reflect off the road and it was bright, but not blinding. i could not see it attached to any vehicle. it traveled smoothly and followed the road. it was only a few feet off the ground as it was clearly seen out the back window of our suv. the time was now about 9:10 pm. we both thought it was weird and neither of us could explain where the light went and what it was. to this day, i wonder about it and have had a few other sightings here and there, but this was the first one of something that i can only describe as "odd." i've told one to two people about this, both of who laughed in my face. i toyed with the idea of submitting this for a while because i don't want to freak out over something that might not be significant after all. at the time, i felt calm because i thought it was a motorcycle. as the incident progressed, i felt uneasy and curious. i still wonder what it was.
content.summary: Something that has always bothered me. orb followed car, disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
In the second week of march 1968 around 9:30 pm i was standing on the beach, facing east, just south of da nang, vietnam.  i observed a red dot 70 degrees above the horizon moving south to north in a very straight line.  since no one in his right mind would fly with any lights on in this area i assumed it to be a space satellite.  with nothing better to do, i continued to watch the "satellite" for about a minute.  at about a 60 degree angle to the northern horizon it suddenly just stopped!  it then back upped and made a perfect counter clockwise circle around a star.  when it reached the exact point that it started the circle, it shot in a general direction toward the star (about 15 degrees to the right of it), going from the red color to green then yellow,  so fast that it seemed to be in three places at once.

the night sky was extremely clear, no moon, no ground lights or flares, and although the sky had more stars visible than i have ever seen, this particular star was in a region of space with no other visible stars near it.

considering how spectacular the sighting was, i assumed that dozens, if not hundreds of people must have seen it also.

only recently did i see the documentary  "the universe ~ i know what i saw" by james fox and did an internet search to see how other people reported the sighting.  when i couldn't find anything even close i realized the mistake i made 44 years ago by not reporting it.
content.summary: Explorers waving good-bye?

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were hiking between green mountain and bear mountain in boulder county sunday morning.  i heard what sounded like a loud airplane about to fly over, but then heard an additional plane sound, and saw two apparent planes approaching from the south, flying north.  they were similar in size, speed, and sound to a small private plane.  as they came closer just to our east i was intrigued to see that they were unlike any aircraft i'd ever seen.  we could see the shape clearly as they flew overhead:  almost like a t, with the longer t-bar at the trailing end of the craft.  although not spectacular, the sighting was curious and mysterious nonetheless. 

my husband, who's a ufo skeptic, also witnessed these aircraft with me.  the basic shape was reminiscent of a plane, but there were no wings along the center of the "fuselage" - just small winglike appendages at the leading edge of the craft and a larger wing-type shape at the rear, more or less in a "t" shape.  these craft few together, one tailing the other slightly offset, heading north out of sight over the hills and presumably over the west part of the city of boulder.  each time we heard planes the rest of the day, we looked to see if the ufos were back, with no luck.
content.summary: Two aircraft flying together, sounded like loud private planes, but had wing configuration unlike any known object

content.detailedDescription:
Some time after taking artist reference photos april 15, 2010, on the kittitinny [sp?]  [blue] ridge about 7 miles southwest of palmerton at "bake oven knob" which is located near the corner border of several counties, and also from two photos taken at foot of mountain, - i discovered either two or three stationery silvery rectangular reflective objects, shaped like an oil drum, maybe twice as tall as wide, and slanted about ten of fifteen degrees to the left. i have the impression these may be cylinders.

i was at about 1,300 feet for most of these photos, and the objects show up in several photographs, slightly higher than i, perhaps at 1,500 to 2,000 feet, on a bright sunshiny spring day.  apparently these objects were concealing themselves in a haze layer hanging over the valley, which was not very deep. they certainly were a hazard to civilian aircraft, while apparently having nothing else better to do.

these were not visible to my eye in the glare when the photos were taken, but the camera caught them, whatever these may be. it took projecting the photos onto a vizio tv screen to be discovered. the photographs were taken from several positions, with decent permanent landmarks, which should make some triangulation possible. work with better programs may bring out detail.

the weather was otherwise quite clear, windless, and visibility was at least 7 miles. since the photos were taken over a period of time, and the objects apparently remained stationary during this time, positional data possibly may be also derived from the information portion in 'properties' of my computer, as well as focal length, shutter settings & etc.

i attempted to send a disk with the photos and other information by mail to mufon, but both times it was returned in the mail, as undeliverable.
content.summary: 2 maybe 3objects discovered in series of photographs

content.detailedDescription: About 30-40 white orbs traveling together in unison then dissapeared, driving home, noticed the traveling lighted orbs moving in unison together took several pics before they dissapeared.  the number of objects led us to believe it was ufos.  felt in awe of what what being witnessed.  the objects vanished from sight.
content.summary: About 30-40 white orbs traveling together in unison then dissapeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was just driving along pontchartrain dr. in slidell, la. heading to the 5 mile bridge. as i stopped at the ref light at the oak harbor entrance, i clearly saw a disc shaped object above & to the front/right of me. it caught my eye when i looked up at the traffic light. 
i was stunned because i absolutely knew what this was. i've never seen anything like this, and couldn't believe i was seeing this. i felt exhilaration, fear, complete disbelief at what i was looking at with my own eyes. cars behind me started to honk, the traffic light had turned green. so i whipped into the closest parking lot & got out of the car, ran around the side of the building to catch sight of it again, and it was gone. my sister came and picked me up... i was hysterical. i am certain of what i saw!!!!! i never spoke of it before, because people i know who know me, advised me that others wouldn't believe this. i've always kept this memory close & guarded... i do know for sure i saw a ufo. i will take a polygraph. i want to know if there have been sightings anywhere around that area as well. i just haven't known what to do with this information, i pray i can get someone to hear me!!
what should i do?
content.summary: At a stop light i saw the object in front of me to the right... high over the lake. i will take a lie detector test today to prove this!  i knowwwww what i saw!!!!!!

content.detailedDescription: I was at a friends house in reseeda ca up in the valley north of la. we were sitting on the porch when one of the people said hey what are those dots in the sky are those balloons. we all looked up and quickly realized they were not balloons they were hovering perfectly still and totally unaffected by the wind. then after about a minute of watching them they begin to move. on other thing i forgot to mention was that at first tehy were both white but as they began to move one of them changed to a pinkinsh red color. the 2 orbs began to move across the sky in what seemed like a perfect line and very slowly. they drifted over us and off to the left hand side.On top of all of this there were lots of planes in the air as his house is in the flight path of the burbank airport. i watched as several airplanes at high altitude and leaving vapor trails passed below the orbs leading me to believe they were very high in the air. through all of this they remained dead silent. we could tell because when the planes cleared the sky there was no noise at all. we followed the orbs across the sky and to the left of his yard when all of a sudden the pink one just disappeared. at first we thought we just lost sight of it but it was gone and seconds later the white one vanished as well. it was really strange to say the least. on top of all of this this is the second time within one months time that i have seen this same thing. about two weeks ago i observed 2 pure white orbs over my house with one disappearing while the other sat and hovered for several minutes until it to vanished. i was able to snap pictures the first time because i was at home and had my nikon d200 with me. today though i only had my phone. i recorded a quick video but you cant really see anything there. either way its all just strange to me and i wonder if anyone else saw these orbs as well? i will post the 3 photos from the first encounter for you guys to check out and tell me what you think
content.summary: 2 bright orbs flying silently in a straight line

content.detailedDescription: I have been observing these things for the past 2 years. decided to use some powerful equipment. i can record these every night.
content.summary: Shot with military night vision equipment.

content.detailedDescription: As we were standing in my driveway a starlight object began moving overhead from se to nw. it changed direction and began moving ne. it disappeared. about ten minutes after it disappeared it appeared out of nowhere brighter than it was the first time, following the same flight path in reverse direction. as it got closer to the original sighting location it started to fade and then disappered completely.
content.summary: Star like object moved overhead, disappeared and reappeared.

content.detailedDescription: As we were standing in my driveway a starlight object began moving overhead from se to nw. it changed direction and began moving ne. it disappeared. about ten minutes after it disappeared it appeared out of nowhere brighter than it was the first time, following the same flight path in reverse direction. as it got closer to the original sighting location it started to fade and then disappered completely.
content.summary: Star like object moved overhead, disappeared and reappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
A group of my friends (7 of us) were walking on the beach directly in front of the holiday inn highland beach at approx 10:35pm. overhead we saw approaching us in a west to east direction 6 orange disk shaped flying objects. the first two objects we saw we thought were a shooting stars, but the color was wrong and the flying was slower than a shooting star would be. then there was four more of them, for a total of six. they were moving faster them an object would float (like a chinese lantern, which is what we thought secondly) and appeared to be flame lit from the bottom.
they continued to fly into the easterly direction out over the ocean until we could no longer see them. the group felt like we had seen something very strange and all ask each other "did we really just see that?", of course we all had.
content.summary: Six orange colored disk shaped flew over highland beach last night in a west/east direction 10:35pm

content.detailedDescription: My brother in law and i both witnessed a very bright light in the west that was brighter than other stars.  we both assumed at first it was a star but then it began to alternate colors between red, green and blue.  at times the whole object would appear white and then begin changing colors.  we watched the object for nearly an hour.  then it just disappeared.  we did not witness it move.  it was as if someone just turned the lights off and it was suddenly not there.
content.summary: Thought it was a very brigth star at first but it began alternating colors between red, blue and green and it hovered at exactly the same spot for about an hour.  had it been a star it would have appeared to have moved in that span.

content.detailedDescription: Witness sent report to fi, having obtained e-mail address from www.Mufon.Com.
content.summary: Dark craft seen.  later a kc-130 tanker transport flew the exact same path.

content.detailedDescription:
The objects cited above remained staionary for approx 10 minutes in a constellation type pattern.  all the while emitting an amber/orange light
we pulled over to observe, and 6 or 7 objects moved and quickly disappeared.  the remaining object remained stationary for about 3 additional minutes and continued to emit orange/amber light.  it then moved abruptly to my right (south?) and suddenly disappeared.
content.summary: When driving hom at about 10,30 pm june 2 2012 my wife and i observed  6-7 amber/orange lights resembling a constellation formation in a stationary position
